definition: caught in (a bad situation)/to fall into (trap etc)
pitfall/trap/to get stuck/to sink/to cave in/to frame (false charge)/to capture (a city in battle)/to fall (to the enemy)/defect

sentences.english: Rwanda was in the throes of genocide.
sentences.chinese: 盧旺達陷於種族滅絕的陣痛。

sentences.english: The disturbance of self-regard is absent in mourning; but otherwise the features are the same.
sentences.chinese: 在悲傷中不會陷於自重，但其他特點是相同的。

sentences.english: There have been no six-party talks with North Korea since 2009.
sentences.chinese: 六方會談自2009年以來一直陷於停頓。

sentences.english: You harshly scold your daughter for knocking the cup over. she breaks down in tears.
sentences.chinese: 你狠狠地臭罵女兒一頓，令她陷於痛苦之中。

sentences.english: Many of the Gods have fallen into a deep slumber.
sentences.chinese: 很多神靈已經陷於了深睡傍邊。

sentences.english: His anxieties threatened to unbalance his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的憂慮可能使他陷於精神錯亂。

sentences.english: The North, by contrast, stagnates in isolation and depravation.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，北邊仍然陷於孤立，貧困不堪。

sentences.english: It penalises lower-rated assets and rewards the spreading of risk.
sentences.chinese: 這使得低等級資產陷於不利處境但有利於分攤風險。

sentences.english: With a restricted range of foods, if children turn their nose up at one particular foodyouy, you could be stuck for choice.
sentences.chinese: 由於食物嚴格分類，如果孩子們挑食，你便陷於抉擇。

sentences.english: The most brilliant leadership can be mired in detail.
sentences.chinese: 最有才幹的領導也會陷於拘泥瑣事的困境中。

sentences.english: They were hopelessly deadlocked in almost total differences of opinion and outlook.
sentences.chinese: 他們絕望地陷於意見和觀點完全分歧的僵局之中。

sentences.english: Due to an unexpected situation, our plan will be put into cold storage until further notice.
sentences.chinese: 由於意外情況，我們的計畫陷於停頓，改日另行通知。

sentences.english: The general strike will disorganize the whole country.
sentences.chinese: 大罷工會使整個國家陷於混亂。

sentences.english: One circle system of ball games could possibly make one team into the most unfavorable situation.
sentences.chinese: 單循環賽制有可能使其中某隊陷於嚴重不公平的境地。

sentences.english: Many, who could not escape, were trapped and burned to death.
sentences.chinese: 許多鳥沒法逃走，陷於火宅而燒死了。
